MCA.Summary: Master of Computer Application (MCA) is a 2 year (4 semesters) academic programme. The curriculum is regularly updated every 3 years to include the most recent and demanding skills to increase the quality of its contribution to the industry. Our students have excelled in a multitude of fields like Java, .Net, Big Data, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Artificial Intelligence, Networking and Security, Python, MATLAB, and Web Development (J2EE/ASP.Net), etc. Apart from the curriculum, the students participate in several Hackathons and Techfest to hone their skills. Various national and multinational companies have been consistently recruiting our students through campus recruitments and many of our students are placed in public and private sectors in India and abroad. Accenture, Accolite, Britannica.com India, C-DOT, Click Labs, CSC, Daffodil, HCL Technologies, IBM, Infogain, Jabong, JK Technosoft, Josh Technology Group, Libsys, Mahindra Comviva, Maruti Udyog Ltd, Microsoft India, Mindfire Solutions, Nagarro, Navyug, Newgen, NIC, Opera Solutions, payU, Polestar, R&F Technologies, Samsung SEL Noida, Sapient Technologies, Shopatplaces, Snapdeal, Successive, TCS, To The New Digital, Tolexo, Vectoscalar, Wipro, Zillious, Zomato, TFT, EXL, Unicommerce, Truminds, Thought focus, American Express, and NIIT, etc. have been recruiting our students from M.C.A. A significant number of alumni of the department are serving as Data Scientists, Software Engineers, IT consultants, Full stack developers, iOS/Android developers, etc. in reputed organizations. Many of them have proven their entrepreneurship skills and many others are working as NET-JRF scholars, faculty members, and consultants in reputed institutes around the globe.

MSC.Summary: Master of Science in Bioinformatics i.e. M.Sc. Bioinformatics is a 2 year (4 semesters) academic, self-financed and evening programme of professional nature. Dr Syed Ismail Ahson took an initiative and started this course during his tenure as the Head of the Department of Computer Science (2001 - 2008). The primary aim of this programme is to prepare biological science graduates with bioinformatics skills for a career in the Post-Genomics era. It is also suitable for especially inspired aspirants from other backgrounds. The programme focuses on helping students build a strong foundation in biotechnology, database management, data mining, statistics, computational mathematics, computer programming, and preparing them for productive careers in fields of bioinformatics, biotechnology, pharmaceutical, and vaccine industries. The programme is designed to equip the students with all the skills required to be a bioinformatician. Programming languages like Python, R, C++, SQL, HTML, PHP, CSS, & JavaScript are taught. To build a strong biological background students are taught Genomics, Molecular Biology, & Biochemistry. To keep up with the current demand the programme ensures that our students have a good grasp on NGS. In order to cater to the requirements of this interdisciplinary course, guest teachers from institutes such as IIT-D, AIIMS, NII, Jamia Hamdard are regularly invited.

Courses: Systems Biology and Advance Bioinformatics Tools

MSC_AI_ML.Summary: The Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (MSc AI & ML) is a cutting-edge 2-year (4 semesters) academic programme designed to meet the growing demand for AI and ML specialists. This programme offers a comprehensive curriculum that combines theoretical foundations with practical applications, preparing students for the rapidly evolving field of AI and ML. Students will gain expertise in areas such as deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, robotics, and data analytics. The course structure is regularly updated to incorporate the latest advancements in AI and ML technologies, ensuring that graduates are well-equipped to tackle real-world challenges. Throughout the programme, students will work on hands-on projects, participate in industry collaborations, and have opportunities to present their research at conferences. Our students have excelled in various domains, including predictive analytics, autonomous systems, intelligent assistants, and recommendation engines. The programme also emphasizes ethical considerations in AI, preparing students to address the societal impacts of these technologies. Whether aiming for roles as AI researchers, ML engineers, data scientists, or AI product managers, this programme provides the necessary skills and knowledge for a successful career in the exciting and rapidly growing field of AI and ML.

Courses: Foundations of Data Science with Python
